parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The alias of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster to which the container belongs.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the cluster.

parameters.name: ContainerId
parameters.description: The ID of the container.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**

parameters.name: Dealed
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the vulnerability is handled. Valid values:

*   **y**: handled
*   **n**: unhandled

parameters.name: Digest
parameters.description: The digest of the image.

parameters.name: Image
parameters.description: The name of the image.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace.

parameters.name: Necessity
parameters.description:
The priority to fix the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   **asap**: high. You must fix the vulnerability at the earliest opportunity.
*   **later**: medium. You can fix the vulnerability based on your business requirements.
*   **nntf**: low. You can ignore the vulnerability.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**

parameters.name: Pod
parameters.description: The pod.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: RepoId
parameters.description: The ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoNamespace
parameters.description: The namespace to which the image repository belongs.

parameters.name: RepoRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description: The types of the assets that you want to scan.

parameters.name: StatusList
parameters.description:
The status of the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   **1**: unfixed
*   **4**: being fixed
*   **7**: fixed

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag that is added to the image.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the vulnerability. Set the value to **cve**, which indicates image vulnerabilities.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUIDs of the assets. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).
